testimonial.title: What Gardeners Say About GardenAI
testimonial.description: Hear from garden enthusiasts who transformed their outdoor spaces with GardenAI.

items.title: Sarah Williams
items.label: Homeowner, Portland
items.description: GardenAI transformed my boring backyard into a stunning cottage garden! The AI understood exactly what I wanted and gave me plant choices that thrive in Oregon's climate.

items.title: Michael Rodriguez
items.label: Urban Gardener, NYC
items.description: Living in a small Brooklyn apartment, I thought I couldn't have a garden. GardenAI designed an amazing vertical garden for my fire escape that's now my pride and joy!

items.title: Lisa Chen
items.label: Sustainability Advocate
items.description: The AI's focus on native plants and water conservation was exactly what I needed. My new garden attracts butterflies and hummingbirds while using 60% less water!

items.title: David Thompson
items.label: Retirement Garden Project
items.description: After retiring, I wanted to create my dream garden but didn't know where to start. GardenAI made it so easy - now I have a beautiful zen garden that's my daily sanctuary.

items.title: Emma Martinez
items.label: Busy Mom of Three
items.description: With three kids, I needed a low-maintenance garden that looked amazing. GardenAI designed a child-friendly space with edible plants the kids love to help with!

items.title: Robert Johnson
items.label: First-Time Gardener
items.description: I killed every plant I touched until GardenAI. The care instructions are so detailed and the plant recommendations are perfect for beginners like me. My garden is thriving!

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About GardenAI
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us via email or chat support.

items.title: How does GardenAI create personalized garden designs?
items.description: GardenAI analyzes your space photos, climate data, soil conditions, and style preferences using advanced AI algorithms. It then selects plants and creates layouts optimized for your specific conditions and maintenance level.

items.title: Do I need gardening experience to use GardenAI?
items.description: Not at all! GardenAI is designed for gardeners of all levels. Our AI provides detailed care instructions, maintenance schedules, and beginner-friendly plant recommendations to ensure your success.

items.title: What garden styles does GardenAI support?
items.description: GardenAI supports a wide range of styles including modern, cottage, zen, tropical, desert, vegetable gardens, and more. Each design is customized to work with your local climate and space constraints.

items.title: How quickly can I get my garden design?
items.description: Most garden designs are generated within 15 minutes of uploading your space and preferences. Complex designs or premium features may take up to an hour for full 3D visualizations.

items.title: Does GardenAI consider my local climate and soil?
items.description: Yes! GardenAI uses your location to recommend plants that thrive in your specific climate zone, considers local rainfall patterns, and suggests soil improvements based on typical conditions in your area.

items.title: Can I modify the AI-generated design?
items.description: Absolutely! All designs are fully customizable. You can swap plants, adjust layouts, change color schemes, and regenerate sections while maintaining the AI's expertise in plant compatibility and spacing.
